name: Can't Get You Out of My Head
description: Can't Get You Out of My Head is a TV mini-series starring Adam Curtis. Love, power, money, ghosts of empire, conspiracies, artificial intelligence and You. An emotional history of the modern world by Adam Curtis.
keywords: tv mini series,archive footage,world history,national myth,technology

review.name: It's not supposed to be easy
review.reviewBody: I would recommend watching no more than one episode per day. There is a grand narrative there that's tied up neatly in the final episode. As always Curtis drivers an interesting collection of stories to feed your imagination and provoke. Documentary as art. Superb

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: Love, power, money, ghosts of empire, conspiracies, artificial intelligence and You. An emotional history of the modern world by Adam Curtis.
